name: Tokyo 23-Ku Seifuku Wars
overview: “There is power in the uniform.” A war breaks out as a result of a ban on uniforms. The chaos is followed by a civil war amongst the Uniform Freedom Organization, “H.E.L.P.”, which results in a new conflict with a new group called “Heaven.” The protagonist searches for her friend’s older brother who went missing during H.E.L.P’s civil war, but she gets drawn into Heaven’s feud… Master the 3 elemental powers of uniforms to conquer your enemies!
